LevelOfDetail.label: Level of Detail
LevelOfDetail.description: The amount of specificity and granularity provided about the cooking process, including ingredient measurements and step-by-step instructions.

ExplanationDepth.label: Explanation Depth
ExplanationDepth.description: The extent to which the reasoning behind actions or choices is explained, providing viewers with context and understanding of the cooking process.

Personalization.label: Personalization
Personalization.description: The degree to which the narrator includes personal anecdotes, preferences, or suggestions, creating a more intimate and engaging viewer experience.

Low: step1_3 (strictly instructional with no personal input)

InstructionalApproach.label: Instructional Approach
InstructionalApproach.description: The method by which cooking instructions are presented, ranging from direct, step-by-step guidance to more conceptual, flexible suggestions.
